Mr. William T. Bolte
Special Assistant

Rutgers University
New Brunswick, New Jersey
Dear Mr. Bolte:
Are you wired-wireless or a licensed station? That is the crux of
the matter. Attached is a mimeographed summary descriptive stateÂ¬
ment about the NAEB, to help clarify status.
If you then qualify, we *11 be glad to send you blanks.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
